# Number of lines of code in Init: 6
sub Init {
  my $context = $main::context{Currency} = new Currency::Context();
  $context->{name} = "Currency";

  main::PG_restricted_eval('sub Currency {Value->Package("Currency")->new(@_)}');
}
public method Currency::quoteRE (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in quoteRE: 5
sub quoteRE {
  my $s = shift;
  $s =~ s/([-\\^\$+*?.\[\](){}])/\\$1/g;
  return $s;
}
public method Currency::quoteTeX (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in quoteTeX: 10
sub quoteTeX {
  my $s = shift;
  my $isText = ($s =~ m/[a-z]/i);
  $s =~ s/\\/\\backslash /g;
  $s =~ s/([\#\$%^_&{} ])/\\$1/g;
  $s =~ s/([~\'])/{\\tt\\char\`\\$1}/g;
  $s =~ s/,/{,}/g;
  $s = "{\\rm $s}" if $isText;
  return $s;
}
